title: What happened to Dianne Buswell and will she be on Strictly tonight?
text:
Dianne Buswell was treated in hospital following an injury while rehearsing with Dev Griffin (Picture: BBC)

It might be the glitziest, most glamorous show on TV, but Strictly Come Dancing has its fair share of injuries too, both on and off the dancefloor.

The latest person to come a cropper is pro dancer Dianne Buswell, who was reportedly rushed to hospital earlier this week after an incident during rehearsals with celeb partner Dev Griffin.

The pair are due to perform the first Couple’s Choice routine of the series on Saturday night’s annual movie week – so what happened, exactly – and will Dianne be able to take to the dancefloor this weekend?

Here’s what you need to know…

What happened to Dianne Buswell?

Dianne was treated for whiplash and has confirmed she will take to the floor on Saturday (Picture: Getty Images)

According to reports the dancer was taken to hospital after Dev accidentally dropped her on her head during rehearsals.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It’s claimed the Radio 1 DJ lost his grip of her during a lift around his shoulders, leaving her to fall to the floor as a result.

‘Dev let her slip from his grasp and Dianne fell and landed on her head,’ a source told The Sun.

‘It couldn’t have been worse. It was horrible to watch Dianne lying prostrate on the floor.

‘Dev… was praying that there was no serious damage — the worst case scenario was that she had some internal head injuries.’

The insider added: ‘She plunged a long way and he couldn’t help but panic about what he’d done. Dev insisted on going to hospital and looked in total shock.’

Will Dianne be performing with Dev on Strictly on Saturday?

Dianne has taken to social media to confirm that despite her injury – with reports that she was treated in hospital for whiplash – she will indeed be taking to the floor on Saturday night.

‘Thank you for all the lovely msgs (sic) of concern,’ she tweeted.

‘We had an accident key word being accident, it was not devs fault at all these things happen.

‘But great news is I’m fine and we both can not wait to dance tonight xxxx thanks again for your thoughts and well wishes.’

She also confirmed her appearance on the show after taking part in an Instagram Q&A when she admitted her favourite routine of the series so far is the one she and Dev are performing on Saturday.

Advertisement

Advertisement

What have Dianne and Dev performed on Strictly so far?

The pair made their debut in the first week with a foxtrot which saw them finish joint third on the leaderboard with 30 points.

They made a similarly impressive showing in week two with 27 for their Jive, leaving them fourth on the overall scoreboard for the first fortnight behind Karim Zeroual, Michelle VIsage and Kelvin Fletcher.

Saturday night will see them performing a couple’s choice routine to the Aladdin favourite Friend Like Me.

Strictly Come Dancing continues on Saturday night on BBC One at 7.10pm.

description: Dianne Buswell was rushed to hospital this week after an accident during Strictly rehearsals with Dev Griffin.
